protein.specific_function: Able to isomerize both 3-cis and 3-trans double bonds into the 2-trans form in a range of enoyl-CoA species.

reference.reference_text: Janssen U, Fink T, Lichter P, Stoffel W: Human mitochondrial 3,2-trans-enoyl-CoA isomerase (DCI): gene structure and localization to chromosome 16p13.3. Genomics. 1994 Sep 1;23(1):223-8.
